text: The 1520s BC was a decade lasting from January 1, 1529 BC to December 31, 1520 BC. ==Events and trends== * 1528 Birth of Dan * 1525 BC—End of Fifteenth dynasty of Egypt. * 1522 BC—Jacob migrates to Egypt, settling in the Land of Goshen, according to the Hebrew calendar. * 1521 BC—April 24—Lunar Saros 36 begins. ==Significant people== *
title: 1520s BC
